thread.title: MusicNews | Watch: Here's that marriage proposal music video with Cry Monster Cry
thread.title_full: MusicNews | Watch: Here's that marriage proposal music video with Cry Monster Cry - entertainment.ie

author: Brian Lloyd
title: MusicNews | Watch: Here's that marriage proposal music video with Cry Monster Cry
text:
If you haven't heard of Cry Monster Cry, you're missing out because they're a decent pair of lads from Dublin.
In fact, they're so sound, they helped a fan propose to his long-term girlfriend through the medium of music videos. That's right. Forget proposing in front of friends, family or even at a concert - we're now using music videos with popular folk singers to do it.
The Marriage Proposal Arms Race is getting out of hand and it's need to stop. IT NEEDS TO STOP BECAUSE HOW DO WE TOP THIS SHIT?
Take a look.
It's a lovely song and fair play to Stephen Murphy for making a big splash of it all. Although, let's be honest, not everyone is friendly with an acoustic duo and have access to filming equipment to make such a video.
But, y'know, good for them.
Via YouTube
